SEARCH
模块 it.polimi.ingsw
程序包 it.polimi.ingsw.model

类 Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player
所有已实现的接口:
Serializable
public class Player extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a player in the game. This class holds the player's hand, board, and various attributes such as score, nickname, and readiness. It provides methods to manipulate and access these attributes.

    • add

      public boolean add(ResourceCard card, int x, int y)
      Adds a resource card to the board at the specified position if the position is valid.
      参数:
      card - the resource card to add ResourceCard
      x - the x-coordinate on the board
      y - the y-coordinate on the board
      返回:
      true if the card was added successfully, false otherwise
